doc.p1: Doks.io's API is really easy to use, the API is composed of a single powerfull method search.
doc.p2: The method takes two arguments : q and docset.
doc.p3: Doks.io's API can also be used client-side through JSONP by simply adding callback or json as a GET argument.
doc.p4: Source code for the api server is avaiable on GitHub : FriendCode/doks-server
